Subject: Error Allow List CAP
Description:
Hello,

Today, when I trayed to save groups of Policy Allow in one CAP after I click to save, the systems show me the message to confirm the configurations it's saved, but when i select the same Politic and go to consult the groups in policy allow, the groups that I had previously assigned, no longer appear.
What_We_Know__c: We have informed the customer about the known issue on the CAP page and provided the workaround steps. We also informed the customer that this issue has been addressed in the 5.9.4.1 server update.
Solution_Comment__c: We have informed the customer about the known issue on the CAP page and provided the workaround steps. We also informed the customer that this issue has been addressed in the 5.9.4.1 server update.
